title: Microsoft security advisory (AV25-433)
description: On July 19, 2025, Microsoft published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: Microsoft SharePoint Server Subscription Edition  versions prior to KB5002768
Microsoft SharePoint Server 2016 (No update available yet)
Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019  versions prior to KB5002754
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
